website_summaries.verdict: This beautifully crafted bathtub caddy has a slot for every imaginable bath time accessory and is large enough to accommodate two. Hands down, the best on the market right now.
pros: Water-resistant organic bamboo construction is sturdy and durable
Adjustable arms fit any size bathtub
Book or tablet stand comes with a waterproof cover to accommodate smaller books and tablets
With dual detachable trays, a candle or cup holder, wine-glass slot, and an angled phone slot, there’s plenty of room for extras
Comes with a matching soap dish
cons: Its large size and solid construction can dwarf smaller bathtubs

customer_reviews.title: Game changer!
customer_reviews.text: This is a game changer!! Bye bye back aches from reading with my book on the edge of the tub. Hello bliss!
customer_reviews.author: Staci Elder

customer_reviews.title: Luxury from end to end
customer_reviews.text: When I placed my order for this tray I looked at the pics but did not realize how really cool this piece is. The ability to change the size is great but I just love the different trays that are removable as well as the ability to put my phone and a kindle in "safe" areas of the tray. I found a perfect place for my TV remove should I want to watch tv and not read. I just got it and used it last night but it appears to be well made, balanced and offers versatility for the things you may want at your fingertips when taking a luxurious bath!
customer_reviews.author: SindiMcG

customer_reviews.title: But this product is even better in person
customer_reviews.text: Very true to the description and photos. But this product is even better in person. Very sturdy without feeling bulky, held everything I expected and stays in place wonderfully while in use. It also fits in with the bathroom well enough to be left out when not in use. My only disappointment is that the spot to hold a tablet doesn’t prop it up enough for me to see very well. This is not the products fault more so because I am so short and my tub is so deep. Very very happy overall with the purchase and it arrived just in time for my day off to test it out!
customer_reviews.author: marissa

customer_reviews.title: Pamper yourself!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, stretches across my free standing tub. keeps all my necessaries handy. Will hold enough stuff ( cell phone, wineglass, book) plus bath supplies, if I wanted to camp out all day, it could be done! Quality is great, bamboo to my liking.
customer_reviews.author: S. Clement

customer_reviews.title: Let the Relaxing Begin
customer_reviews.text: I love this caddy tray. It took a while for me to review...needed to test it out a few times. Royal Craft Wood really had taken the time to construct this product for consumers. I did not know that the soap dish and small tray were removable/interchangeable; very convenient for additional space or storing elsewhere in the tub. The product comes with strips to place where you desire to prevent the wood from scratching your porcelain tub. Did I say I love it?!
customer_reviews.author: Inalah@2219

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our jetted tub
customer_reviews.text: The ones on the store are not going to be wide enough for a jetted tub. Had to reign it and get this one. It looks better because it is thick doesn’t have the thin chrome wires. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Kunya Jones

customer_reviews.title: Works well on a wide soaker tub!
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality feel and look of this product. It's easy to keep a glass of water, a hand towel for keeping your hands dry while reading and your reading material on it without feeling crowded. What I really love is the ease of reading a magazine or a book. These are 2 different reading experiences, but this caddy makes reading both comfortable because of the width of the reading area. You can also rest your arms on it while holding your magazine or book. I'd recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: lg

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, elegant, mondern, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Elegant, sturdy, modern, convenient. Excellent features, great design, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Pjo04

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product when it first arrived. However, after about a year of use, it has begun to mold pretty badly. Will try a plastic one next. I purchased bamboo to avoid plastic, but this has not worked out well. Perhaps this piece would be okay for occasional use, but it is a tad heavy and not easily moved in and out the tub (especially in a small bathroom with very little storage- which was why I bought the piece in the first place). It did look very nice until it turned black.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel R

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service and a good product
customer_reviews.text: This caddy is great for taking a relaxing bath. It is well constructed and sturdy, but when it arrived one of the pieces that holds soap was broken. I contacted the seller and they immediately sent a replacement piece. The rest of the caddy has held up well. It can hold your phone/tablet (unplugged of course), a book, a glass of wine, and soap.
customer_reviews.author: SunnyinTX

customer_reviews.title: A must buy!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new bathtub caddy! The brown Royal Craft Wood cover for the middle piece is removable if needed. I am happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Tiff

customer_reviews.title: It is really a new experience of bathing
customer_reviews.text: I've been dreaming about a bathtub tray for a long time - last Christmas, my boyfriend bought a Royal Craft Wood caddy tray as my Christmas gist. I was eager to try it but I didn't think it would be this thrilling. Being able to read a book or have a drink in the bathtub is a little thing but I feel classy thanks to that. The wood looks very well in the bath - all the house guests ask us where to get a similar caddy. It still looks as good as new and, I hope, will stay this way for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Great design and love the royal touches!
customer_reviews.text: My husband just remodeled my bathroom and when I saw this caddy it looked like it would be a perfect finishing touch! I absolutely love it! It's everything I I hoped it would be! Thank you also for feeding a homeless kitty and giving it a hug for me!
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and useful for toddler bath time!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for an unconventional purpose- for my toddler to use as a play table in the bath tub. It works great, and keeps him from dumping his pouring toys on the tub ledge, therefore eliminating spills. We’ve had it for many months now, and while I need to bleach it on occasion, it has withstood a great deal of use.
customer_reviews.author: Reen

customer_reviews.title: Fits all my things and so luxurious!
customer_reviews.text: This tray is perfect for a relaxing bath! I always wanted something like this and thought they would be too expensive, but this one is so nicely made and a reasonable price. I love it. I might even give some as gifts this year.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a replacement for one of the thinner, bamboo styles that broke after about a year's use. This stretches further for my garden tub, and the slide rails are good and solid, so we shouldn't have the same problem of it giving out. It doesn't sag in the middle, which is nice when you have expensive electronics sitting on it! The silicone grips seem to hold on well enough, although I was a little worried at first about them. The tray area is nice and roomy, and I like that I can have my soaps, etc on the little side dishes. Worth the extra price to get the solid construction!
customer_reviews.author: L Webb

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: After getting this tray, I keep joking I could live in my tub. It's pretty big to hold everything I usually need - my phone, my tablet, a book, and bath supplies. I've been using the caddy pretty regularly and nothing every fell down in the water. I was hesitant at first as to whether or not I should get the tray seeing that my bathtub is a little wider than all the normal ones are. However, I managed to adjust it because the side are made that way. I love this tray. Wouldn't give it up at any cost.
customer_reviews.author: Esther Whatley

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned this might not work because my tub isn't conventional however it expanded perfectly with room for more. A no slip pad was included. Feels sturdy. Plenty of cubbies for your favorite bath items. I love that it holds my ipad as well. If you plan to read I recommend a kindle.
customer_reviews.author: SaavyShopper

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy, missing parts
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea why this caddy has high reviews... it is super flimsy/poorly made—also the white “lacquer” coating is spotty at best with many areas missing paint. Also, the mention of a “no-slip” bottom is totally misleading... they send adhesive grippers that you have to place on the bottom (and the grippers are clearly not designed for the caddy, just a cheap after thought). Also, I only received one stick on gripper when I should have received four. Missing parts is just plain annoying. In theory this bath caddy looks/sounds great, but the quality is so lacking it’s not worth keeping. Sending back for refund. Bummer. I’ll keep looking for a better version.
customer_reviews.author: TOH

customer_reviews.title: Great concept!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! The quality is great and met all my needs and more. I like the 2 little removable trays. Versatile and convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: All the stars.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my husband. I asked him how many stars he'd give it, and he said 50 - he's pretty happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Noyes

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny...
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this thing! It is expandable, so it can fit a wide range of bathtubs. The color is a beautiful dark brown, and the construction is sturdy. The wineglass holder is perfect. It keeps your wineglass stable even if you move the tray around. The notch for the cellphone holds the phone in place without issue, and the book/tablet holder in the center works perfectly. I love this thing!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey A. Coffman

customer_reviews.title: I love this!
customer_reviews.text: Mine just came a few days ago and this was put to the test night one! It has removable pieces/compartments, such as the soap dish and 2 side compartments. I tried the phone holder slot on the right and it worked great! I watched YouTube videos to prevent boredom while soaking and used one of the compartments to hold a flameless candle. I haven't used the iPad/bookholder yet, but plan to at some point. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: GAE

customer_reviews.title: Update- they sent a replacement! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.text: I've owned it two months and thr wood is already splitting on one side. Doesn't seem to be able to hold very much weight as the crack started appearing about a week ago and we've only used it sparingly.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Matos

customer_reviews.title: Such a nice item. I was going back and forth between ...
customer_reviews.text: Such a nice item. I was going back and forth between cheaper versions and I'm glad I sprung for this one.
customer_reviews.author: Auts

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love this!
customer_reviews.text: I'd read all the reviews so was a little nervous with what to expect but was so excited when I opened it! The quality was way better than I expected - it really looks like a luxury item! With a rolled white face towel, candle and fabric frangipani it makes my tub look straight out of a spa! It had a couple of tiny scratches which I just touched up with eye liner :)
customer_reviews.author: michelle duncan

customer_reviews.title: Logo ruins the looks of it but is nice
customer_reviews.text: I’ve thought from the first time I saw it that it would be a 5 Star item if their logo wasn’t right in the middle in LARGE bold letters. I’m going to find a way to cover it up. We have a large bathroom with a very specific design to it and simplicity keeps it elegant. This doesn’t fit that design. I believe if consumers like your product, they will find the logo no matter the size or location of it, no need to blemish the product with it. The color is nice and rich, it matches our walnut vanity and mirrors. It’s a busy design, could be simpler but overall it is nice and very functional.
customer_reviews.author: WnS

customer_reviews.title: Best tub caddy ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for the perfect tub caddy for years. We have an old fashioned claw foot tub and it's been difficult to find one that rests securely on the rounded/curved edges of the tub. This one is perfect! Well made, very sturdy and beautiful too! It also has very secure spots for my glass of wine, cell phone and a book, magazine or tablet. So happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Lynnie

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I lik that it fits my large tub, and it’s really white not yellowish. Great for relaxing and romantic nights.
customer_reviews.author: LOVING LIFE

customer_reviews.title: Shoddy &
customer_reviews.text: This tray is not solid white. It’s more like white-washed and the color is spotty. The iPad stand is a stretchy material and mine was cut unevenly (see photo). There are also nicks in the corner where the 2 pieces of wood meet. The tray looks ok from a distance but up close you can see the shoddy craftsmanship. I am returning mine.
customer_reviews.author: KySoph

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality of this product .... it is exactly as it is portrayed. I used it the first night I got it, propping my iPad up.... slipping a wine glass in the holder.... lighting a candle. We also had placed little bottle of bath oil. Another night, we had a little ceramic dish of salt and limes.... and a small bottle of tequila, and two shot glasses placed on the tray.... There is a lot of room to place things. The tray is adjustable thank goodness, and fit even on my oversized bathtub. It made for the most romantic and wonderful bubble bath for us. Highly recommend! One of my favorite purchases on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu Haffner

customer_reviews.title: Novice spray paint job on the white tray
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the white tray, and the finish is laughably terrible. It looks like they took a can of spray paint to the bamboo version without bothering to prime it. The paint is totally uneven, and edges and crevices are thinly coated or totally bare. The enormous logo is also pretty unsightly. I’m returning it.
customer_reviews.author: KatieNS

customer_reviews.title: Best one ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this one. I have a small hourglass shaped jacuzzi and the other ones fall off and move around. This is solid and looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Teri Farina

customer_reviews.title: Just love this tray
customer_reviews.text: I want to say right away that I got the caddy recently and wasn't yet using it so much. I don't yet have much to tell about its durability (though it seems made to last). However, when it comes to the experience, I've absolutely loved it. Having a chance to read or watch TV while taking a bath feels very comfortable - I normally don't like taking a bath exactly because it feels like a waste of time. Now it's not the case anymore. By the way, as the tray is white, it fits my white bathtub very well.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: I really like the product except when it came it was broken
customer_reviews.text: I really like the product except when it came it was broken. Nothing I'm sure I can't fix but still.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bugs
customer_reviews.text: Looked great when I opened and it put it in my tub, but when I went back to take a bath days later there were little bugs crawling out of it. I don’t know if they are termites from the wood? I was freaked out and had to throw it out. Never have seen bugs like that in my house before.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: spend your money elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: so i ordered this as a gift for myself from my parents. it’s shoddily put together and the paint looks like someone took one quick swipe over it with a pint spreader. i plan on contacting the company, because there are many options available for this same kind of product. if the corners don’t fit together prior and it mostly looks like bare wood when you ordered white, i don’t think it’s anywhere worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: kerrie21

customer_reviews.title: Bad split in the bamboo - not on seam. Extra cut.
customer_reviews.text: First problem is there’s a really large split in the bamboo completely across one of the side caddy boxes. Right where another reviewer had them. Not on the join - straight along the bamboo thread. Makes it totally unusable. Second problem is an extra cut in the bamboo along the main panel. Both problems definitely happened in manufacturing because it was inside the shrink wrap and neither shrink wrap nor box was damaged in any way.
customer_reviews.author: KL

customer_reviews.title: The item sent didn’t match the description
customer_reviews.text: The product ordered was nothing like the picture. It showed a “royal” label in the picture, stated it was made by “royal” and in dark wood. Came light wood with “modrine” label running across the top.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Lanford

customer_reviews.title: Best thing ever
customer_reviews.text: I prefer baths over showers and had been wanting one of these for a while. My boyfriend got me this and some bath bombs and a bath pillow for Christmas and this has been the best thing for me me. Its my time and I can enjoy it even more with this tray. I can easily read or watch something on my Ipad, have a glass of wine, etc. I cant recommend this tray enough. If you are thinking about this one, get it. Its been almost a year and it still looks like new.
customer_reviews.author: L. Henry

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality and looks cheap for the price
customer_reviews.text: Water stains the wood, looks like it hasn’t been treated. And it looks really cheap after just 2 uses. It already shows so much wear and tear and I have literally used it two times! For the price it is not worth it at all. Has cool features though to store the ipad and phone plus a soap holder etc. Just wish the quality was better
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Mahapatra

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: After reading some of the reviews, I wasn't sure what I was going to get. This Bamboo Bath Caddy, arrived in perfect condition. It is an added luxury to my newly remodeled bathroom. And although I have used it a couple times, I just haven't used it to its fullest capacity. i.e. The tablet prop or the wine glass holder. They are great features if I could just sit still that long. :-) I would recommend this product if you love to languish in the tub (especially).
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: It came broken
customer_reviews.text: It came broken!! I bought this for my girlfriend for Christmas. A bath tray was a key factor for her Christmas gift (a spa Staycation) I was so excited to have this set up for her for Christmas morning, however when I opened the package the item was broken. One of the removalable ledges the side containing the soap tray was split. The side was basically broken into two pieces with a single hair like piece of wood keeping it from being completely unattached. Very dissatisfied and disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Jen Lane

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous product but received out the wrapper/box broken
customer_reviews.text: This caddy is gorgeous. Unfortunately, the slot that holds the soap dish was broken when I took it out the bag/box. It looks like a quality piece, but if it breaks just from shipping, quality or craftsmanship becomes questionable. I like that it extends to fit my soaking tub. The slots for the wine and cell phone were appropriately sized. The slot for the candle is just behind the cell phone, so if you use a real candle, be aware because it will warm your phone. Go with an electric candle. I’m hoping to have the slot replaced vs returning the entire caddy.
customer_reviews.author: JKae B.

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, but arrived broken (twice).
customer_reviews.text: My wife ordered this to use in our master bath and both times it arrived broken. The first time the soap dish wood was split and the corner of the frame was separated. Box was damaged too, so we sent it back and requested a replacement. Second one came and the wood on another one of the removable parts was split. The packaging is inadequate or the product is just low quality, either way we're looking for something else.
customer_reviews.author: DrewKat

customer_reviews.title: Too late to return - piece of junk.
customer_reviews.text: It's been less than 2 months and maybe 3-4 baths and the top layer is bubbling and peeling. The stand that holds the ipad is flimsy, the phone slot is too narrow and the wine glass slot is impractical Once you have the glass slid in, you can't take it out without removing the tray on the side.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Could be better designed
customer_reviews.text: The solid wood seems of high quality, and the finish is attractive. The included anti slip pads are a thoughtful touch. However the caddy could be better designed. While the center rack is adjustable, no position is good for an iPad - they all are far too angled. The included soap dish is nice, but there’s no way for water to escape if placed on the included tray since the bottom is flat. Finally, the company’s logo is very big, which seems a little out of place in an otherwise zen bathroom environment without any other large logos.
customer_reviews.author: S. Joe

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Top of the line tub caddy for sure! Came with little rubber grippers that you can attach where the caddy hits your tub and that keeps it sturdy and in place. Nice quality wood with compartments for your drink, and I really love the rack for your book or tablet. Also a place for your phone if you’re using that in there. Just make sure they’re unplugged! When not bathing, it makes for a great extra shelf for your daily get ready or whatever.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Ono

customer_reviews.title: Molds very quickly
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and I loved the expansion to fit over sized tub but if you get this caddy wet and do not completely dry it immediately after using, it will be full of mold by second use and you will not want it near you by the third use. I have tried to use different cleaners on it and this is the cleanest I can get it back to. Impossible to get the mold from around where the wine glass stem is suppose to go. Disappointed. Bought this in anticipation of new home purchase so I had this still new in the box waiting for construction to be complete. Could not return it because return window had closed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not great looking
customer_reviews.text: Too big for a 26" tub. Also the cell phone slot is too small for a phone with an Otterbox Defender case (I have an iPhone 7 plus). My tub slants upwards (slipper tub) so you can only pull it up so far before it starts to slip down (just bamboo bottom, no antislip). But really its just visually too bulky and takes away from the look of my free standing tub. Its like a block of wood sitting on top. Didn't like it enough to keep it and hide it behind the tub when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Anya

customer_reviews.title: By far, the Best gift I’ve gotten for her
customer_reviews.text: This is the best gift I’ve gotten my girlfriend in our 4 yrs together. She absolutely loves it and uses it daily. She said she could tell how high quality it was the second she touched it. The craftsmanship is second to none. Available in multiple colors I was able to find one that complimented the newly remodeled master bath perfectly. NOTE TO GIFTERS: the box this comes in has a picture of the unit so you must be able to intercept the package before the giftee sees it.
customer_reviews.author: Sonny

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bathtub caddy tray for my mother-in-law as a birthday present. She's the kind of person that has everything (or has the luxury of going out and purchasing pretty much anything she wants), so I wanted to be sure that this product was a quality gift - and it far surpassed my expectations! It feels every bit like a luxury item that you'd splurge on and you can tell that the manufacturer paid attention to every small detail they could. If you're at all on the fence about purchasing this product, don't hesitate - it's exceptional for the price! I'd easily purchase one for myself if I had a bathtub to soak in!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Well made, well designed
customer_reviews.text: This bath caddy is wonderful! It is well built, well designed, has silicone "feet" to protect my tub and keep the caddy from sliding around. It has a place for everything. This is the crowning touch for my new bathroom. This is well worth the price (and the wait to get it). It arrived in perfect condition and completely assembled. All I had to do is add the silicone strips in the correct place on the bottom to fit my new soaking tub.
customer_reviews.author: Babs

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for the person who has everything
customer_reviews.text: This is a great gift. It is well made, has great features, and fits tubs up to 43 inches(the tub in the photo is 43 inches, and reasonably priced. My husband absolutely loves it, particularly after a day of heavy gardening. I bought the natural color, which is beautiful and I don’t have to be concerned with paint chipping as with some of the other finishes. My only negative is that we only received one of the adhesive stays to grip the caddy to the tub. I’ve written to the seller to send the other grips. I’m expecting that the seller will send the grips. If he/she does not, I will add it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Anne Dumas

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: I would not buy again. It was broken right out of packaging. Very poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Deluxe Spa Quality
customer_reviews.text: If you want the full relax experience, this is a must have! Not only is this a product so sturdy that my 300lb self feels comfortable leaning on, but it has the perfect balance of traction/give in the expanable sides so I can adjust for where I want it to sit on my oversized oval tub. I accidentally added the included stick on silicone grippers on the wrong part and their customer service even sent me a free replacement set. I love the floating side trays so I can have my drink far away from where my phone is resting. Easy to clean and maintain!
customer_reviews.author: Velexia

customer_reviews.title: ~Maybe for half the price~
customer_reviews.text: 3 stars because my girlfriend loves having this thing. The extendable arms are great, and it met the purpose I bought it for - a more enjoyable bath for my partner. However, I wouldn’t say it’s “luxury” or premium build by any means. It had a couple dings in the would, multiple paint blemishes and droplets where the paint should’ve been smoothed out. The wood itself feels pretty cheap - if we were to drop it I have zero doubt this thing would break in some way. May be worth mentioning mine never came with the “free soap holder”
customer_reviews.author: DasKavaar

customer_reviews.title: Nice but was broken
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for months ago as a gift for a friend and she just opened it and saw that the tree was broken. I would really appreciate if I could return this even though it is five days after the 30 days but since this was gifted we had no idea it was broken until she opened it.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Lane

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: I had it for jot even 3 months use and It got moldy. With black mold! Had to throw it away
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bath tray! Meets all your needs!
customer_reviews.text: This bath tray is absolutely perfect! It is a great size and very well made. It has enough space to hold all the necessities for a relaxing bath. As a first time mom, it has help create my own little oasis in my own home. The quality for the price is remarkable! I already plan on ordering one as a gift for a friend!
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: STAY AWAY
customer_reviews.text: Love it, it holds everything so I can watch movies while soaking in the tub UPDATE: STAY AWAY BLACK MOLD UNDER CADDY
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Guntert

customer_reviews.title: My Guest Bath Looks Like a Spa !
customer_reviews.text: I just built my First Home ( I'm old, so this is awesome for me )... and wanted the guest bathroom to be just as awesome as the Master.. I have received so many compliments on this.. Example: Sister said.. OMGoodness !! This fells like I'm at the Spa !! Really Cool.. Really, Really Cool. I have never taken a bath & used this.... But it is made so well (Quality Wood) I can't wait to use it.. I need to order another one for my Master Bath Now.. Steady & Elegant !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Superior Craftsmanship and Reasonable Pricing
customer_reviews.text: I was a little concerned with purchasing this caddy on-line, sight unseen, as I was concerned about product quality. I could not have been happier when the caddy arrived and I immediately recognized its high-quality. The wood is authentic and beautiful plus its been fabulously designed to easily adjust to any tub width and yet still maintain its high level of sturdiness. The caddy provides clearly thought-out spaces for all the essentials while bathing. I would definitely recommend this product for personal use in addition to giving it as a gift to someone special.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Matulia

customer_reviews.title: Loving it for baths
customer_reviews.text: I had this in my wishlist for about 6 months before buying it as a gift to myself. I have not used it to the point that it's mildewing like others have referenced, but I also don't have the water high enough to reach the bottom of the tray, and store it in the closet after a bath rather than on the bathtub when not in use. I find the capacity to be perfect for my bubble bath, and appreciate the stand cover that prevents my tablet from ending up in the water if I shift too suddenly. I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Love this bath caddy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this caddy to replace one I purchased a couple years ago that finally bit the dust. I love this one so much more and it was only a few dollars more than my previous one, but much better quality and options. I love that it easily adjusts to bathtub size, has a place for almost everything and the wine glass holder works very well. I dont feel like my wine is going to tip over. Plus, it is just lovely. I got the white washed and it looks wonderfull in my coastal themed bath room.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Cozart

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my wife for a valentines day gift for our new bath. It's pretty secure when sitting across our bath tub. My wife has only used it twice in since we have had it (9 months or so) and it's cracked a lot of the paint of. I can't tell if it was from water (Which would be very small amount every on it and would have been wiped up right away) or my better guess is that its just a cheaply painted item. I wouldn't purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew B.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting something like this for quite some time. I love a good bath to relax and heal your body and mind. Some candles and some wine and there you are, forgetting the world. The caddy is also great if you want to watch a movie on your ipad or listen to some music on you phone. I ordered the natural wood. I try and keep the water off it, but the soap bubbles touch because you cannot have a bath without bubbles! The wood has remained the same color and in great shape. The caddy gets used at least once a week, but usually more. Hope this helps. Happy bathing!
customer_reviews.author: Carey Bourlett

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, functional and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Love this caddy, I would highly recommend. I’m a frequent bath taker for relaxation, as is my husband and this thing is amazing. Love that I can use it to hold up my iPad or book. It’s sturdy and beautiful and so functional. I was afraid it wouldn’t work as well because one side of our tub is a bit shallow against the wall, so there’s not a lot of room to work with - but the silicone strips included thoroughly keep it in place. You just need a little bit of edge and you should be fine!
customer_reviews.author: Angela M.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived but not as promised Updated!
customer_reviews.text: This bathtub caddy arrived with only 3 silicone tabs to hold it in place and without the soap holder. I am extremely disappointed. The bamboo is lovely and sturdy but the caddy shifts around so I removed it and I an returning it UPDATE: I was quickly contacted by the company/Natalie and they offered to send me a Free caddy. I was pleasantly surprised by the superior customer service. The product is excellent and the customer service is The Best!
customer_reviews.author: L. M. R.

customer_reviews.title: Do not order!!! Terrible quality!!
customer_reviews.text: Added a star because I Had to but really doesn’t deserve any. This product is terrible. Not worth it for the money at all. I ordered this and when it came in, the trays that come with it were cracked and broken right out of the plastic. I then noticed a small dent on the box and assumed that’s what happened. No big deal. Returned it for a replacement item. The replacement came today and it is also broken!!! Very disappointed as this looks so beautiful. It’s just terrible quality and not worth the $50+ price tag. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Adreanna Helms

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of space
customer_reviews.text: This tray holds everything I need for a bath. I usually have my phone and iPad and an ice cold water and a hand towel on the tray. There is plenty of space to customize what you set on it. The deck of our tub is 4” wide and this tray sits perfectly and securely on it. I like the wood because it gives it a richer and warmer look. I have thoroughly enjoyed this item.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron V. Thatcher

customer_reviews.title: Better than my last one
customer_reviews.text: I had another wood bath tray that started to look like it was getting mold or the wood was turning black because it was unfinished and untreated. I threw that one away and got this one. It is painted and so far so good. I think having the wood treated and covered will make it last longer. That said my previous one lasted about a year so I'm hoping this one will last even longer since it is painted.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Cheney

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised to find one that matched the blue in my redecorated bathroom perfectly. This is very sturdy and beautiful. It has a lot of features. My only problem is that the wine glass holder which was the most important thing to me was not big enough to fit the thickness of the base of any of my wine glass holders so I used the candle holder part for my wine glass. The price was perfect compared to others especially since they had all the colors that other brands don't.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Ralston

customer_reviews.title: Broke the first time I tried to use
customer_reviews.text: Was super excited for this bath tray after reading all the reviews, however mine broke in multiple areas after using it one time. Two different trays are cracked and popped right out of the bath caddy when putting it one the tub. The wood is split. Appears to be poor craftsmanship.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea B. Hartman

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Arrived very well protected in plastic. I even dropped it on a stone floor before opening it, and there wasn't a scratch. Nicely made and sturdy looking. The small silicone strips for the bottom seem like a good idea to keep the caddy from slipping, although I haven't installed them yet. Fits my claw-foot bathtub fine, even though it has sloping sides.
customer_reviews.author: K. Wilde

customer_reviews.title: Came beautifully wrapped.
customer_reviews.text: Came beautifully wrapped .... used it twice and it cracked Passed the date to returned it sadly, because I didn't see until it was too late
customer_reviews.author: Xhagab's

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: The craftsmanship of this bamboo tray is impeccable! It’s light weight yet durable. It holds everything from a book or iPad to your cell phone, glass of wine 🍷, even a bud vase if you want flowers. It holds quite a bit without appearing crowded or cluttered. What’s great is that it’s expandable and could probably fit almost any tub. This works well with one of our tubs that’s attached to the wall. The tray grips the lip/side of the tub just fine and stays in place; doesn’t slide. This is definitely a great gift! I recommend this tray!
customer_reviews.author: Li

customer_reviews.title: A Great add on to your Me time
customer_reviews.text: I had bought this about a month ago and I have fallen in love with it. I usually have one or two days of at home spa and I was needing one of these. I have found it very sturdy. It slides on both side so you can put it as it fits on the bathtub. I use all the parts to feel comfortable, I use the middle part to hold my phone or tablet it is secured on there do the it has three ridges to put your device on. Also there is a spot to put your drink, snacks and even a soap holder. Needless to say that I love it.
customer_reviews.author: THE NEGRON'S

customer_reviews.title: Treat yourself or someone you love! Must have!
customer_reviews.text: Scared it wouldn’t fit as well as it does. Must have for self care and winding down. It’s strong yet not bulky. High bamboo quality. Wipes easily dry. Came with no slip peices that worked like a charm to keep from moving while in use. Super versatile for use with water, wine, etc. plenty of room for bath/spa products to safely stay atop with or without a book, tablet, device and even a snack.
customer_reviews.author: Mama

customer_reviews.title: Very POORLY MADE with CHEAP WOOD
customer_reviews.text: The Wooden Tray came broken in couple places. And while handling a few more pieces came apart. Very poorly made with cheap wood. Shipping box was intact. Now I have to take the trouble to re-pack and ship it back to return it to the seller to get a refund. Total waste of time and effort.
customer_reviews.author: KA

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I finally got a bathtub! We recently moved at the start of this year and our house has a nice bathtub. My husband bought me this and it has been great for holding my tea cup, writing on, or using the draw. Yes I’ve painted in the bathtub. My only complaint is that the stand for an iPad or kindle leans back pretty far so I usually end up folding it and using my own separate stand to sit there instead.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah testa

customer_reviews.title: Works great but should know it DOES NOT fit every tub size.
customer_reviews.text: Great design and look and it works great but it should be noted that the description would give the illusion that it fits every tub size but it does not. Especially apartments where tubs are standardly much narrower. Would be nice if the width could be reduced even further. Perhaps in future models.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Bae

customer_reviews.title: Love the Design
customer_reviews.text: I have teak furniture, shelves, and benches in my bath with a waterproof vinyl wood floor. So, I really liked this tray for my whirlpool bath. I am going to add some Danish Oil and/or Teak Tung Oil to make it a little darker and keep it really sealed. I am not brave enough to use the stand for a Tablet and for my cell phone until I see if I knock the tray over into the water! But I do have some nice soaps, bath salts, loofah sponge, and aromatherapy oil on the tray to be ready for tonight.
customer_reviews.author: Shiratha

customer_reviews.title: Functional art, Love this!
customer_reviews.text: This is really a spa quality, I can see this lasting a very long time. The wood is good quaility and the product is sturdy My tub is wider in the middle (41") and this fits accross that part of the tub without any signs that it migh bow in the middle at some time, even with a book on it. Looks good no matter how far you extend it. I bought this as a gift to myself with Christmas money. Makes a wonderul present. I'd even give it as a baby shower gift and tell the mom to not forget to pamper herself. Glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: BONNIE SUE ANACKER

customer_reviews.title: As advertised-great caddy!
customer_reviews.text: We just had our master bath redone. We got a freestanding tub with no storage space around it so I was looking for something to go over the tub. This seemed to be what I was looking for, so I ordered it. It worked great. It came with 3M pads to stick on to keep it from slipping on the tub- those worked for me as I didn’t experience any slipping. It held my iPad and a glass of wine perfectly. Look forward to relaxing more in my new tub with this caddy!
customer_reviews.author: Laura B.

customer_reviews.title: Bath time must have
customer_reviews.text: Great not to precariously balance my laptop on the side of the tub anymore while I’m lounging and streaming my fav shows. UPDATE: Took off one star bc one rubber pad already fell off. instead of shipping just the rubber part, Amazon reshipped an entire unit which was a little annoying bc I had to take out the rubber part only and then lug rest back to store to reship back to avoid being double charged.
customer_reviews.author: vlvet18

customer_reviews.title: Lasted less than a year
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tray in February 2019 for a bathtub that is very rarely used though it is near an open walk-in shower. The tray surface turned lighter in places and started expanding only after a few months. I threw it away around September 2019 when it became dark and moldy.
customer_reviews.author: Tat

customer_reviews.title: It was a hit with the Girlfriend
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a present for the girlfriend to use in the jetted tub. The bamboo looks good, fits across the width of the tub and was a hit with her. In the middle there is a wire and sheet of plastic contraption that is supposed to hold a book (or maybe a small computer, kindle). It is very cheap looking compared to the rest of the product. I would have prefered that they just have left it off. Better yet the wire and plastic should be replaced with a matching piece of bamboo. I would have paid extra for that. Overall, a good product. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: William J Shepard

customer_reviews.title: The Very Best Bathtub Caddy Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Love this so much! I looked for a long time to find a caddy that was American made by a wonderful, small, family business and which answered every detail of need one could have. Such luxury!!! I feel like a Queen in my tub because I can prop up my book or ipad, my iphone, a long stem glass of wine in a secure notch holder that won't let it wobble and spill, and still have room for soap, wash cloth and a candle or small vase for a flower. Queen....that's me in my new stand alone tub with this caddy from heaven! I can't thank the makers enough for making such a superior product!
customer_reviews.author: Jari Poulin

customer_reviews.title: A Great Gift!
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves her time in the bathtub, and this tray works perfectly! Our tub is narrow and this fits well - it doesn't require extending to fit. I checked before ordering and it is as promised. The removable trays are a nice touch - as an artist, she uses them for pens & markers instead of bath stuff. The adjustable panel for supporting a book or tablet works well, too. A note from Alex - the single veteran father who makes the trays - saying that he'd personally find a solution to any problem was a nice touch. No problems, no solutions required, but thanks for your service and your product Alex!
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and fits my roman tub just right! Plus it goes with the decor of my bathroom. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Stephie

customer_reviews.title: Wood cracked in less than 2 months!
customer_reviews.text: 4/6/20 Update: the company quickly responded to my email and asked me to send my information to them and they will send me a replacement. I truly appreciate that they offered a replacement. Hope this one last because I do love the bath tray! I received this in February 2020. I love it but then notice over the months the wood began to crack! Not just in one area but 2! It’s a pretty piece but I hate the fact that I purchased it and less than 2 months later it is not holding up!
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: My wife was recently activated in support of the covid 19 mission with the US Army, she will return in November this year, I was looking for a gift, or something that would surprise her upon her return to our new home, and I saw this caddy on amazon. I loved the pictures and so I purchased it, and with in a few days I had the caddy, I set it up and it was better than the pics on line, love this caddy, its durable, and sturdy, I know my wife is going to love it! GREAT craftsmanship!! Thanks again, great product, 5 stars all the way!!
customer_reviews.author: Justin fallis

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but not for all tubs
customer_reviews.text: This is great, except that the way my bathtub is joined with my tile leaves little space for it to sit firmly. It was supposed to come with 4 rubber feet but only came with two. Unfortunately any time this even lightly touches my bathtub, it leaves a black mark I need to scrub off. I'll put better rubber feet on it than the ones it comes with and use it carefully.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Bamboo bathing
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy and beautiful addition to tub relaxation with plenty of space to hold your important bath things. Soap. Wine. Book. Candle. I bought this tray, candles and a head pillow as a reward for me reaching a personal goal. Now every bath not only brings relaxation but also reminds me of my abilities.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great for bigger tubs and well-built not great for standard tubs.
customer_reviews.text: The reason I did not give this 5 stars is it’s not really practical in a standard bath tub. It’s a bit bulky. I managed to make it work but it’s honestly more comfortable without it. But if you had a big tub it’s pretty amazing and well-built. Also if you’re a bigger person make sure your bathtub is also deep or you will feel like you’re taking a bath in a high chair.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Kroll

customer_reviews.title: It's not as nice as advertised
customer_reviews.text: A little disappointed, but mostly satisfied. I'm not sure how it is going to stay on the tub and not fall in period very little has been Provided for this issue. I have an idea that I'm going to Try. I already placed it on my tub in it fell in period I think I am going to use some of that Velcro double stick tape and whenever I'm using it I could stick the Velcro to the Velcro and when I'm not pull it off. I already gifted one to my sister and I'm kind of embarrassed now.
customer_reviews.author: April S

customer_reviews.title: looks great!
customer_reviews.text: I love the way the caddy looks in my bathtub. I used it for the first time yesterday. I had a 2-wick candle lit, a large water bottle, my actual laptop (cautiously), plus a few other items on the caddy, and everything fit perfectly and didn't move. It comes with grips, which really helped keep the caddy in place, also. I did not wipe it down after use, so I need to make sure I do that and store it away from the bathtub (which is right next to the open shower so it gets wet) in order to keep the caddy clean and looking new. Overall, this product is exactly what I was looking for and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good and solid.
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Some minor oversights but overall, appears to be a durable bamboo bath table. The phone holder doesn’t fit iPhone with case and table itself is not entirely painted white in places. Also, the brown material of the “Royal” logo fabric that fits over the trapezoidal backing for book holder is threadbare at the bottom. Minor things like that just detract from an initial impression of quality. Otherwise, it matches description and for the price, I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Lotus

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift for a New Homeowner
customer_reviews.text: I'm a realtor and gifted this to a client who purchased a new home with me. She absolutely loved it! She's given this bath caddy many compliments as far as the quality of craftmanship and how well it's held up after constant use. She's convinced me to purchase one for myself! These are gorgeous!!!
customer_reviews.author: Susie S.

product_meta.title: ROYAL CRAFT WOOD Luxury Bathtub Caddy Tray, One or Two Person Bath and Bed Tray, Bonus Free Soap Holder (Natural Bamboo Color)
feature_bullets: MONEY BACK GUARANTEE. We take pride in the quality of our bathtub caddy and offer 100% MONEY BACK GUARANTEE in case it fails to live up to your expectations! Buy our bathtub reading tray, try it and if, for any reason, you think that it was not for you, we will be happy to refund every penny you paid.

BATH CADDY FOR TWO: Royal Bathtub Caddy Designed to Comfortably Accomodate a Couple in the Tub. Two Side-Trays, Extendable Handles and Accessory Slots Make it a Perfect Fit for Both: One or Two Bathers at Once. Bring Romance into Your Life! Perfect Choice for Anniversary, Honeymoon or Romantic Date Night!
WATERPROOF, STURDY AND BUILT TO LAST - This Unique Bathtub Caddy Is Made of the High Quality Bamboo Wood and covered with a thin protective coat of lacquer.

ADJUSTABLE AND SLIP RESISTANT - This Bathtub Caddy Tray was Specially Designed to Fit Most Bathtubs Available on the Market. It has Biggest Extendable Sides up to 43 Inches and Non-Slip Silicone Grips to Protect Tub Caddy from Sliding.
NEWEST DESIGN - Bathtub Caddy Tray with a Waterproof Book or Tablet Holder, Wine Glass Slots and Two Removable Trays for Bath and Spa Accessories.
FREE SOAP HOLDER - The Best, Cost Effective Way to Transform Your Bathroom
